episodes.title: 5 Disturbing Cults That STILL Exist Today
episodes.description:
These disturbing cults are still active and dangerous! In this video, I will go over 5 Disturbing Cults That STILL Exist Today. They all have shady practices and/ or pasts that have memberships to this day! This list includes; Order of the Solar Temple, Twelve Tribes, Happy Science, Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, and Superior Universal Alignment.

Which of these cults do you find the most disturbing? Let me know in the comments!

00:00
00:01  Order of the Solar Temple
01:21   Twelve Tribes
02:26   Happy Science
03:18   Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
04:15   Superior Universal Alignment
